original_title: El Viento Sabe Que Vuelvo A Casa
overview: Looking for extras and locations, a filmmaker settles on Chiloé, the second largest island off the coast of Chile. He does auditions, but mainly listens patiently to the stories of young and old people. As an outsider, he cautiously searches for the soul of the community and its underlying tensions.
title: The Winds Know That I'm Coming Back Home
